    • recover

      Setter method that is used in case of a reconnection, sets every parameter in order to let the player perform the right actions.

      recover in interface RemoteInterface
      Parameters:
      gameID - ,
      matrix - is the LivingRoom,
      shelfies - is a list of the players' shelves,
      id1 - is the ID of the first CommonGoalCard,
      id2 - is the ID of the second CommonGoalCard,
      personalGoalCard - is the player's PersonalGoalCard,
      points - a list of the players' current points,
      playerList - is the list of the players' nicknames.

      RemoteException - .
